adminDashboard.title: Admin Dashboard Help
adminDashboard.content:
Welcome to the **Admin Dashboard**. Here, you can manage inventory and monitor stock levels.

### Features Available to Admins:
- **Add Products:** Register new products with name, quantity, and price.
- **Delete Products:** Remove unwanted products from stock.
- **Edit Product Details:** Modify quantity or price.
- **Monitor Inventory:** View total stock value and low-stock alerts.

userDashboard.title: User Dashboard Help
userDashboard.content:
Welcome to the **User Dashboard**. As a user, you have limited access to inventory features.

### Features Available to Users:
- **Search for Products:** Look up product details by name.
- **View Stock Information:** Check product availability and stock levels.
- **Modify Product Details:** Users **can update stock quantity and price** to reflect market conditions.

âš  **Restrictions:** Users **cannot add or delete products.** Only administrators have full inventory control.

addProduct.title: Adding Products
addProduct.content:
To add a product:
1. Enter the **product name**, **quantity**, and **price**.
2. Click **'Add Product'** to confirm.

ðŸ”¹ Only **administrators** can add new products.

deleteProduct.title: Deleting Products
deleteProduct.content:
To delete a product:
1. Search for the product by name.
2. Select the product from the list.
3. Confirm deletion.

âš  **Warning:** Deleted products cannot be recovered.

changeProduct.title: Editing Products
changeProduct.content:
Modify product details:
- **Update quantity** if stock levels change.
- **Adjust price** based on market conditions.

Click **'Save Changes'** to confirm.

searchProduct.title: Searching for Products
searchProduct.content:
Use the search bar to find products in inventory. You can:
- View product details (quantity, price, total value).
- As an administrator, edit product information directly from search results.

listStock.title: Viewing Stock Levels
listStock.content:
This page provides an overview of all inventory. You can:
- Check available stock levels for each product.
- Download a **CSV file** containing inventory data.
